schedule_description: We couldn‚Äôt be more excited to celebrate our upcoming wedding and we want to make the most of this special time with the people we love most. In the days leading up to the big wedding we‚Äôve planned a few events and gatherings to spend time together, create memories, and soak up all the joy. Whether you‚Äôre local or coming from afar, we‚Äôd love for you to join us for as much as you can. Here's what we have planned!
we_would_like_have_you: We would be delighted to have you join us on our special day. Please let us know if you can make it.
rsvp_submitted: We've received your RSVP and are looking forward to celebrating with you.
rsvp_negative_submitted: We're sorry you can't make it, but we appreciate you letting us know.
comment_placeholder: If you have any additional questions or would like to leave us some wise words, please let us know.
questions_contact: If you have any questions, please contact us.
join_special_day: Join Us for Our Special Day
please_rsvp:
We're excited to celebrate our wedding with you. 
Please RSVP by January 4, 2026.
story_line_one: We‚Äôre so happy you‚Äôre here. As you probably know by now‚Ä¶ we‚Äôre getting married! After sharing so many memories, laughs, and late-night snacks together, we‚Äôre ready to take the next step and say ‚ÄúI do‚Äù, and we couldn‚Äôt imagine doing it without the love and support of our favorite people.
story_line_two: This website is your go-to spot for all the details about our big day. You‚Äôll find info about the ceremony and reception, travel and accommodations, the schedule, and a few other fun things along the way. We‚Äôve created it with love (and a little bit of coffee), and we hope it helps make planning your trip as easy and exciting as possible.
story_line_three: Thank you from the bottom of our hearts for being part of our lives. We can‚Äôt wait to celebrate, dance, and make new memories with you all.
not_coming: You confirmed that you are NOT coming on:

kids_answer:
üë∂ We‚Äôd love for you to enjoy a wild night out kid-free, dance floor full, drinks flowing!
But we totally get it. If you feel you can‚Äôt relax without your little ones nearby, they are more than welcome to join the celebration.
Just let us know in your RSVP if they‚Äôll be coming so we can plan accordingly!
food_answer: üçΩÔ∏è Delicious food and an open bar await! Let us know any dietary restrictions on your RSVP.
parking_answer: üöó There‚Äôs parking available at the venue. Rideshares work great too.
gifts_answer: üéÅ No gift is necessary! Just bring your wonderful self! But if you're one of those guests who insists on spoiling us, a small contribution would be greatly appreciated. It's completely optional, of course, but it would mean the world to us! For our Brazilian friends, Pix works great, and for our Swedish guests, Swish is perfect.
faq_question: What should I do if I still have questions?
faq_answer: ‚ùì Text Ramon or K√ºbra. We got you!
rio_description:
We‚Äôre kicking off our wedding vacation with one of the world‚Äôs most iconic celebrations‚ÄîCarnival in Rio!
Join us for sun, samba, and unforgettable moments as we dive into the heart of Brazilian culture.

Carnival officially begins on February 14, but we‚Äôll be arriving the night of February 15 and staying until February 20, based in Copacabana at the Hotel ibis Copacabana Posto 2‚Äîright by the beach.

While most of the biggest Carnival parties and blocos happen in Downtown Rio (Centro), getting there is easy‚ÄîUber is safe, reliable, and affordable, so you‚Äôll be able to go back and forth without hassle.

Expect beach days, bloco parties (street parades), flowing caipirinhas, and maybe even a night at the legendary Samb√≥dromo.üå¥üçπüåû

‚ú® What to Expect:
Feb 16‚Äì19 ‚Äì Blocos, beach, street parties, and beautiful chaos

Come for the dancing, stay for the memories. Whether you're down for the full Carnival experience or just want to enjoy the vibes by the beach, we can't wait to celebrate with you. üåûüíÉüï∫
family_description:
After the high energy of Carnival, we‚Äôre setting aside some quiet time for our families to connect before the big day.
Since many of our loved ones haven‚Äôt had the chance to meet yet, we‚Äôll be spending a few days in Campinas with both sides of the family.

This time is especially important to us, and we‚Äôre so excited to see our families come together.

We‚Äôll be off the grid (just a bit!) during this period, focusing on family time before the celebrations¬†continue.
 That said, we‚Äôll still be keeping an eye on the group chats and, if the opportunity arises, we might join you for a spontaneous¬†hangout¬†or¬†two!
prewedding_description:
For booking hotels, we listed some areas according to your preference.

If you want a more city environment, go to restaurants and places, Cambu√≠ is a must.

If you prefer a quieter area, close to nature, Taquaral is a nice place, also with some houses at Airbnb.

If you prefer to drive and be close to the highway, there are options close to Barao Geraldo.
dresscode_description:
Let‚Äôs Get Fancy!

Our wedding will have a smart formal dress code. Think elegant and polished, more refined than cocktail, less strict than black tie. So bring out your best suits, gowns, cocktail dresses, polished shoes, and a touch of glam. ‚ú®

The celebration will be mainly indoors, with a bit of outdoor space. Since it‚Äôs February in Brazil, think warm weather and breathable fabrics.

Color-wise, feel free to get creative! All colors are welcome, including black (it is technically the funeral of our single lives, after all üòÑ).

Just one little favor: please avoid white and beige tones. Not because we don‚Äôt love them, but because the bride would really like to be the only one glowing in those shades. Let‚Äôs not compete with her spotlight moment, okay?

For some extra comfort later on, bring your flip-flops for the party! üíÉüï∫

We can‚Äôt wait to celebrate with you, in style!
